sqlMap.select: SELECT pk_locale AS locale_key, locale_code, locale_name FROM locale;
SELECT pk_registration AS registration_key, fk_locale AS locale_key, username, password, fullname, email_from, email_replyto FROM registration WHERE pk_registration=#registration_key#;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE registration SET fk_locale=#locale_key#, username=#username#, password=#password#, fullname=#fullname#, email_from=#email_from#, email_replyto=#email_replyto# WHERE pk_registration=#registration_key#;
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM subscription WHERE fk_registration=#registration_key# AND subscription_host=#subscription_host#;
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO subscription (pk_subscription, fk_registration, fk_protocol, subscription_host, host_user, host_pass, host_auto) VALUES (#subscription_key#, #registration_key#, #protocol_key#, #subscription_host#, #host_user#, #host_pass#, #host_auto#);
sqlMap.select: SELECT pk_subscription AS subscription_key, subscription_host, host_user, host_pass, host_auto, protocol_name FROM subscription JOIN protocol ON pk_protocol=fk_protocol WHERE fk_registration=#registration_key#;

SELECT pk_subscription AS subscription_key, fk_protocol AS protocol_key, subscription_host, host_user, host_pass, host_auto, protocol_name FROM subscription JOIN protocol ON pk_protocol=fk_protocol WHERE pk_subscription=#subscription_key#;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE subscription SET fk_registration=#registration_key#, fk_protocol=#protocol_key#, subscription_host=#subscription_host#, host_user=#host_user#, host_pass=#host_pass#, host_auto=#host_auto# WHERE pk_subscription=#subscription_key#;
